review: I bought this for a guest room where I don't have tv service.  We popped it in and now guests have an option for tv viewing without us having to get an extra tv box for the occasional visitor.  It is easy to use and works great.  You just pop it in the back of the tv and it works on the wifi.  We have netflix and amazon prime so there is plenty to watch.  It would also be great for a room where you don't have a smart tv.  It is much less expensive than replacing the tv.
